name: Thome Wake
storyline: You are a full-time streamer who loves to play horror games. Your viewers keep trying to scare you by talking about Pisadeira and how dangerous it can be. You don't believe your viewers, thinking that they are only joking with you. Until the day that Pisadeira shows up in your house, doesn't allow you to wake up from your sleep, and cages you in a nightmare, trying to take your soul. Now your goal is to figure out how to escape this nightmare and wake up from it.
summary: An indie horror first-person game where you are in control of a streamer who learns from his viewers about Pisadeira, a demon/monster from Brazilian folklore. In disbelief, when he sleeps, Pisadeira doesn't allow him to wake up, leaving him stuck in his nightmare, and he has to figure out a way to leave, and finally wake up
